## Folder structure

```{r project_directory}

if(!dir.exists(work_directory)) {
  dir.create(work_directory, recursive = T)
}

for(sub_directory in c('data', 'figures', 'figures/MODULE_NAME')) {
  dir.create(paste0(work_directory, '/', sub_directory))
}

```
